events.message: I recently purchased a jacket from your store, but it doesn't fit me at all. I'd like to request a refund as soon as possible.
The customer has requested a refund due to the product not fitting as expected.
Assigning this case to Refund Specialist for further assistance with the return process.
Hello! I’m sorry to hear the jacket doesn’t fit. I’m here to help you with your refund request.
Could you please confirm if the jacket is unused and in its original condition with all tags attached to proceed with the refund?
Yes, the jacket is completely new and I still have all the tags on it. I can send photos if needed.
Thank you for confirming. Please send the jacket back using the prepaid return label we will email you shortly, and we will process your refund within 5 business days after receiving the item.
That sounds great, thank you for the clear instructions. I'll send it back tomorrow.
We have received your returned jacket and processed your refund. The amount should reflect on your payment method within 3-5 business days.
Just checking in to confirm you've received your refund and if there’s anything else we can assist you with.
Since the refund has been successfully processed and confirmed, we are closing this case now. Thank you for contacting us!
